attributes.action: Appear on a live radio programme on Talk Sport once a fortnight to listen to peoples concerns
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the Prime Minister to take the time to go on a live national radio show (Talk Sport) for an hour once a fortnight to listen to the concerns of ordinary people (with no vetoing of any questions or topics as is done on the BBC's Question Time), and answer them, outside the insular cocoon of Westminster, and not just hear their concerns at election times and then forget all about them till next time. Thank you.
